name: hue Names
description:
Train yourself in recognizing colors!
The Philips hue system shows you a color. You press the button with the right color name on it. When you press the correct button it will show the color. If not, the button will turn black.
If you succeeded to guess all 8 names you are promoted to the next level: again 8 names but now a little more unknown names.
After testing your knowledge of color names in your mother tongue you can explore other languages. Hue Match supports English, Dutch, German, French, Italian and Spanish color names!
